panels.title: General

series.name: Prix moyen d'une voiture pour un revenu de 0 à 1000€

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cu.income AS customer_income,
  AVG(c.price) AS avg_car_price
FROM
  catalog_car c
  JOIN customer_car_registration r ON c.id = r.car_id
  JOIN customer cu ON r.registration_id = cu.current_registration_id
WHERE
  cu.income >= 0 AND cu.income <= 1000
GROUP BY
  cu.income
ORDER BY
  cu.income;

panels.title: Corrélation entre le revenu et le prix des voitures (0-1000€)

series.name: Prix moyen d'une voiture pour un revenu de 1001 à 2200€

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cu.income AS customer_income,
  AVG(c.price) AS avg_car_price
FROM
  catalog_car c
  JOIN customer_car_registration r ON c.id = r.car_id
  JOIN customer cu ON r.registration_id = cu.current_registration_id
WHERE
  cu.income > 1000 AND cu.income <= 2200
GROUP BY
  cu.income
ORDER BY
  cu.income;

panels.title: Corrélation entre le revenu et le prix des voitures (1001-2200€)

series.name: Prix moyen d'une voiture pour un revenu de plus de 2201€

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cu.income AS customer_income,
  AVG(c.price) AS avg_car_price
FROM
  catalog_car c
  JOIN customer_car_registration r ON c.id = r.car_id
  JOIN customer cu ON r.registration_id = cu.current_registration_id
WHERE
  cu.income > 2200
GROUP BY
  cu.income
ORDER BY
  cu.income;

panels.title: Corrélation entre le revenu et le prix des voitures (2201€+)
Puissance moyenne et émissions de CO2
Répartition des prix des voitures par marque

targets.rawSql:
SELECT c.brand, COUNT(*) AS registration_count
FROM catalog_car c
JOIN customer_car_registration r ON c.id = r.car_id
GROUP BY c.brand
ORDER BY registration_count DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: Top 5 des marques de voitures les plus immatriculées

series.name: Statistiques moyennes par marque de voiture

targets.rawSql:
SELECT cc.brand, AVG(cc.price) AS avg_price, AVG(bce.co2_emissions) AS avg_co2_emissions, COUNT(*) AS car_count
FROM catalog_car cc
JOIN brand_co2_emissions bce ON cc.brand = bce.brand
GROUP BY cc.brand;

panels.title: Relation entre le prix des voitures et les émissions de CO2 par marque

targets.rawSql:
SELECT c.brand, AVG(cu.income) AS avg_income, AVG(cu.age) AS avg_age
FROM catalog_car c
JOIN customer_car_registration r ON c.id = r.car_id
JOIN customer cu ON r.registration_id = cu.current_registration_id
GROUP BY c.brand
ORDER BY avg_income DESC;

panels.title: Revenu moyen et âge par marque de voiture

targets.rawSql:
SELECT cc.seating_capacity, cc.number_doors, COUNT(*) AS registration_count
FROM catalog_car cc
JOIN customer_car_registration ccr ON cc.id = ccr.car_id
GROUP BY cc.seating_capacity, cc.number_doors;

panels.title: Immatriculation des voitures avec le nombre de places assises et le nombre de portes

targets.rawSql:
SELECT cc.brand, AVG(cc.power) AS avg_power
FROM catalog_car cc
GROUP BY cc.brand
ORDER BY avg_power DESC;

panels.title: Marques de voitures avec la puissance moyenne la plus élevée
Emissions de CO2 Marque

targets.rawSql: SELECT brand, COUNT(*) FROM brand_co2_emissions GROUP BY brand ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

panels.title: Nombre total de voitures par marque

targets.rawSql: SELECT brand, AVG(co2_emissions) FROM brand_co2_emissions WHERE co2_emissions > 0 GROUP BY brand ORDER BY AVG(co2_emissions)

panels.title: Émissions de CO2 moyennes par marque

targets.rawSql:
SELECT brand, AVG(energy_cost) AS avg_energy_cost
FROM brand_co2_emissions
GROUP BY brand
ORDER BY avg_energy_cost DESC;

panels.title: Coût moyen de l'énergie par marque de voiture

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN bonus_malus >= 0 THEN 'B'
        WHEN bonus_malus < 0 THEN 'M'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS bonus_malus_category,
    COUNT(*) AS count
FROM brand_co2_emissions
GROUP BY bonus_malus_category;

panels.title: Distribution des valeurs de bonus/malus

targets.rawSql:
SELECT CONCAT(brand, ' ', car_name) AS brand_car_name, energy_cost
FROM brand_co2_emissions
ORDER BY energy_cost ASC
LIMIT 3;

panels.title: Top 3 des modèles de voitures ayant les coûts énergétiques les plus bas

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    CASE 
        WHEN co2_emissions >= 0 AND co2_emissions <= 100 THEN '0-100'
        WHEN co2_emissions > 100 AND co2_emissions <= 200 THEN '101-200'
        WHEN co2_emissions > 200 AND co2_emissions <= 300 THEN '201-300'
        WHEN co2_emissions > 300 AND co2_emissions <= 400 THEN '301-400'
        WHEN co2_emissions > 400 AND co2_emissions <= 500 THEN '301-400'
        WHEN co2_emissions > 500 THEN '500+'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS co2_emissions_range,
    COUNT(*) AS count
FROM brand_co2_emissions
WHERE co2_emissions IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY co2_emissions_range
ORDER BY co2_emissions_range;

panels.title: Répartition des émissions de CO2

targets.rawSql:
SELECT brand, COUNT(bonus_malus) AS with_bonus_malus
FROM brand_co2_emissions
GROUP BY brand
ORDER BY with_bonus_malus;

panels.title: Rapport bonus/malus par marque de voiture

targets.rawSql:
SELECT CONCAT(brand, ' ', car_name) AS brand_car_name, energy_cost
FROM brand_co2_emissions
ORDER BY energy_cost DESC
LIMIT 3;

panels.title: Top 3 des modèles de voitures ayant les coûts énergétiques les plus élevés
Client

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN cu.age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25'
    WHEN cu.age BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35'
    WHEN cu.age BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45'
    ELSE '46+'
  END as age_group,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE cu.gender = 'M') as male_customers,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE cu.gender = 'F') as female_customers
FROM customer AS cu
GROUP BY age_group;

panels.title: Nombre de clients par tranche d'âge et genre

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cu.has_second_car,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE cu.gender = 'M') as male_customers,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE cu.gender = 'F') as female_customers
FROM customer AS cu
GROUP BY cu.has_second_car;

panels.title: Nombre de clients possédant une deuxième voiture par genre

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  cu.marital_status,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE cu.gender = 'M') as male_customers,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE cu.gender = 'F') as female_customers
FROM
  customer AS cu
GROUP BY
  cu.marital_status;

panels.title: Nombre de clients par statut marital et genre

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  income,
  AVG(debt_rate) AS avg_debt_rate
FROM
  customer
GROUP BY
  income
ORDER BY
  income;

panels.title: Taux d'endettement moyen par revenue
Répartition des clients par âge
Nombre d'enfants à charge Répartition

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN gender = 'F' THEN 'Femme'
    WHEN gender = 'M' THEN 'Homme'
    ELSE 'Autre'
  END AS gender_format,
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM customer
GROUP BY gender_format;

panels.title: Composition par sexe
Revenu moyen par statut marital
Catalogue

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) as total_cars,
  c.color
FROM
  catalog_car AS c
GROUP BY
  c.color;

panels.title: Nombre de voitures par couleur

targets.rawSql:
SELECT cc.color, AVG(cc.price) AS avg_price
FROM catalog_car cc
GROUP BY cc.color
ORDER BY cc.color;

panels.title: Répartition des prix des voitures par couleur

targets.rawSql:
SELECT power, COUNT(*) AS car_count
FROM catalog_car
GROUP BY power
ORDER BY power;

panels.title: Distribution de la puissance dans les voitures

series.name: Émissions moyennes de CO2 et prix moyen

panels.title: Relation entre la puissance et les émissions de CO2

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT name, length, seating_capacity
FROM catalog_car
ORDER BY length DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: Les 5 voitures les plus longues et avec leur place assise
Marketing

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25 ans'
    WHEN age BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35 ans'
    WHEN age BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45 ans'
    ELSE '46+ ans'
  END AS age_group,
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM customer_marketing
GROUP BY age_group
ORDER BY age_group;

panels.title: Répartition des tranches d'âges dans les données de marketing
Répartition des sexes dans le secteur du marketing

targets.rawSql:
SELECT dependent_children, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM customer_marketing
GROUP BY dependent_children
ORDER BY dependent_children;

panels.title: Répartition des enfants à charge dans le marketing

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(debt_rate / 100) * 100 AS debt_range, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM customer_marketing
GROUP BY debt_range
ORDER BY debt_range;

panels.title: Répartition des clients par fourchette de taux d'endettement dans le secteur du marketing

targets.rawSql:
SELECT age, MAX(income) AS max_income
FROM customer_marketing
GROUP BY age
ORDER BY max_income DESC
LIMIT 5;

panels.title: Top 5 des groupes d'âge ayant les revenus les plus élevés en marketing
